# writing Hi
00 02 31 06 00 35 31 42 02 48 69 00 00 00 00 00 	..1..51B.Hi.....
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 92 02 31 06 40 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.....’.1.@......
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 77 02 31 06 80 00 	..........w.1.€.
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 b7 	...............·
02 31 06 c0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.1.À............
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 f7 02 33 01                         	....÷.3.

# writing bolded hi
00 02 31 06 00 35 31 42 04 ff 81 48 69 00 00 00 	..1..51B.ÿHi...
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 14 02 31 06 40 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.......1.@......
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 77 02 31 06 80 00 	..........w.1.€.
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 b7 	...............·
02 31 06 c0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.1.À............
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 f7 02 33 01                         	....÷.3.

# writing a really long bolded message
00 02 31 06 00 35 31 42 96 ff 81 48 69 20 74 68 	..1..51B–ÿHi th
69 75 73 20 69 73 61 64 73 66 6c 20 6a 61 73 6c 	ius isadsfl jasl
64 6b 66 20 6a 61 6c 73 64 6a 66 20 6c 61 6b 73 	dkf jalsdjf laks
64 6a 66 6c 3b 6b 61 6a 73 64 66 6c 20 6b 6a 61 	djfl;kajsdfl kja
64 66 6c 6b 6a dc 02 31 06 40 20 73 61 64 6c 6b 	dflkjÜ.1.@ sadlk
66 6a 61 73 6c 64 6b 66 6a 6c 64 6b 6a 61 73 6c 	fjasldkfjldkjasl
64 66 6b 61 6c 73 64 6a 66 6c 61 6b 6a 73 64 66 	dfkalsdjflakjsdf
6c 3b 6b 61 6a 73 64 66 6c 6b 6a 61 73 64 66 6c 	l;kajsdflkjasdfl
6a 61 73 6c 3b 64 6b 6a 66 6c 17 02 31 06 80 61 	jasl;dkjfl..1.€a
3b 6b 73 64 6a 66 6c 6b 61 6a 73 64 66 6c 3b 6b 	;ksdjflkajsdfl;k
6a 61 73 64 3b 6c 66 6b 6a 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	jasd;lfkj.......
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 da 	...............Ú
02 31 06 c0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.1.À............
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 f7 02 33 01                         	....÷.3.

# sending A, B, C as three messages in order 1 2 3
00 02 31 06 00 35 31 42 01 41 00 00 00 00 00 00 	..1..51B.A......
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................

02 31 06 c0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.1.À............
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 f7 02 31 07 00 35 32 42 01 42 00 00 	....÷.1..52B.B..

31 07 80 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	1.€.............

00 02 31 06 00 35 31 42 01 43 00 00 00 00 00 00 	..1..51B.C......
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................

00 02 31 06 00 35 31 42 0d 41 ff 81 42 ff 80 43 	..1..51B.AÿBÿ€C
ff 81 44 ff 80 45 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	ÿDÿ€E..........
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................

# sending abcdefghij with default settings - has length 10
00 02 31 06 00 35 31 42 0a 61 62 63 64 65 66 67 	..1..51B.abcdefg
68 69 6a 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	hij.............
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 e0 02 31 06 40 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.....à.1.@......
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 77 02 31 06 80 00 	..........w.1.€.
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 b7 	...............·
02 31 06 c0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.1.À............
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 f7 02 33 01                         	....÷.3.


# sending the special characters
#star,heart,left,right,phone1,phone2,smile,circle,taiji,music,question,full
00 02 31 06 00 35 31 42 18 c0 00 c0 02 c0 04 c0 	..1..51B.À.À.À.À
06 c0 08 c0 0a c0 0c c0 0e c0 10 c0 12 c0 14 c0 	.À.À.À.À.À.À.À.À
16 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 7b 02 31 06 40 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.....{.1.@......
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 77 02 31 06 80 00 	..........w.1.€.
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 b7 	...............·
02 31 06 c0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.1.À............
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 f7 02 31 0e 00 04 00 04 00 04 00 04 	....÷.1.........
00 0a 00 f1 e0 0a 00 04 00 04 00 04 00 04 00 00 	...ñà...........
00 04 00 04 00 04 00 0a 00 11 00 e0 e0 11 00 0a 	...........àà...
00 04 00 04 00 04 00 00 00 00 00 71 c0 8a 20 84 	...........qÀŠ „
20 80 20 80 20 40 40 20 80 31 02 31 0e 40 11 00 	 € € @@ €1.1.@..
0a 00 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 71 c0 8a 20 	............qÀŠ 
84 20 40 40 20 80 11 00 0a 00 04 00 00 00 00 00 	„ @@ €..........
00 00 00 00 08 00 18 00 3f e0 7f e0 3f e0 18 00 	........?àà?à..
08 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 10 00 30 00 79 02 	............0.y.
31 0e 80 7f c0 ff c0 7f c0 30 00 10 00 00 00 00 	1.€ÀÿÀÀ0......
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 01 80 7f c0 7f 	............€À
e0 7f c0 01 80 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 	àÀ.€...........
00 03 00 ff 80 ff c0 ff 80 03 00 02 00 00 00 00 	...ÿ€ÿÀÿ€.......
00 00 00 e4 02 31 0e c0 f0 00 f8 00 18 00 18 00 	...ä.1.Àð.ø.....
18 00 18 20 1b 40 1c 80 19 40 f8 80 f0 00 00 00 	... .@.€.@ø€ð...
f0 00 f8 00 18 00 18 00 18 20 19 40 1a 80 1d 40 	ð.ø...... .@.€.@
18 80 f8 00 f0 00 00 00 00 00 7f c0 ff e0 c0 60 	.€ø.ð.....ÀÿàÀ`
c0 60 ca 60 1f 00 31 80 97 02 31 0f 00 2e 80 6e 	À`Ê`..1€—.1...€n
c0 c0 60 ff e0 00 00 00 00 7f c0 ff e0 c0 60 ca 	ÀÀ`ÿà....ÀÿàÀ`Ê
60 1f 00 31 80 2e 80 6e c0 c0 60 ff e0 0e 00 31 	`..1€.€nÀÀ`ÿà..1

00 00 0e 00 3f 80 7f c0 7f c0 ff e0 ff e0 ff e0 	....?€ÀÀÿàÿàÿà

3f 80 7f c0 7f c0 7f c0 3f 80 3f 80 0e 00 00 00 	?€ÀÀÀ?€?€....
00 00 46 02 31 0f 80 0e 00 31 80 40 40 40 40 f1 	..F.1.€..1€@@@@ñ

70 00 00 00 00 00 10 00 18 00 14 00 12 00 12 00 	p...............

00 61 80 63 00 06 00 0c 00 0c 00 00 00 0c 00 0c 	.a€c............
00 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff 	.ÿðÿðÿðÿðÿðÿðÿðÿ

# sending the star
00 02 31 06 00 35 31 42 02 c0 00 00 00 00 00 00 	..1..51B.À......
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 a1 02 31 06 40 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.....¡.1.@......
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 77 02 31 06 80 00 	..........w.1.€.
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 b7 	...............·
02 31 06 c0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.1.À............
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 f7 02 31 0e 00 04 00 04 00 04 00 04 	....÷.1.........
00 0a 00 f1 e0 0a 00 04 00 04 00 04 00 04 00 00 	...ñà...........
00 04 00 04 00 04 00 0a 00 11 00 e0 e0 11 00 0a 	...........àà...
00 04 00 04 00 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 52 02 33 01          	.........R.3.

00 02 31 06 00 35 31 42 02 c0 00 00 00 00 00 00 	..1..51B.À......

00 00 00 00 00 00 00 71 c0 8a 20 84 20 40 40 20 	.......qÀŠ „ @@

# sending the full block
00 02 31 06 00 35 31 42 02 c0 00 00 00 00 00 00 	..1..51B.À......
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 a1 02 31 06 40 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.....¡.1.@......
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 77 02 31 06 80 00 	..........w.1.€.
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 b7 	...............·
02 31 06 c0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.1.À............
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 f7 02 31 0e 00 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff 	....÷.1..ÿðÿðÿðÿ
